imgDesc.text:
The Udumbara are mysterious flowers that will only grow when Sorush has awakened the power stored within Runestones. <color=#ffe14b>Hold Sorush's Interact skill</color> to cause the Umdumbara to <color=#ffe14b>stay in bloom.</color>
It is said that in ancient times, the Pari would harvest the pistils formed by the blooming Udumbara to use as offerings unto a dead god...
